casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Clark, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Clark v. Indus. Comm. (1999), 86 Ohio St.3d 578.]

(No. 99-87 Submitted July 28, 1999 Decided September 22, 1999.) Koltak & Gibson L.L.P., Ronald J. Koltak and Peter J. Gibson, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Dennis H. Behm, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed. The cause is returned to the Industrial Commission for relief consistent with State ex rel. Gay v. Mihm (1994), 68 Ohio St.3d 315, 626 N.E.2d 666.

Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., and Cook, J., dissent. Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents and would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals.
